column2: format=A5 glossy paperback, black and white

column1: '''''Aiglos 21''''' is a regular Polish language issue of '''''[[Aiglos (journal)
column2: Aiglos]]'''''.<ref>''Aiglos''' 21 official page in Polish http://aiglos.tolkien.com.pl/numer21.php (accessed 1 September 2016)</ref><ref>''Aiglos''' 21 official page in English http://aiglos.tolkien.com.pl/english/issue21.php (accessed 1 September 2016)</ref>

column1: ** "Sauron’s war with the Elves 1693–1701. A draft monograph."
** "Representations of Queen Mab in English literature from Shakespeare to Susanna Clarke"
** "About The Hobbit, joke and allegory once again – a polemic against Maria Błaszkiewicz’s article"
** "A long-expected end" – a review of the extended DVD edition of ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''"
** A review of the game ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]''
** "Tolkien in the context of his times a review of Dimitra Fimi’s book ''[[Tolkien, Race and Cultural History]]''"
** "On laundry tickets, inspirations, fanfiction and collecting points. A few words about the publication of J.R.R. Tolkien’s ''[[The Story of Kullervo]]''"
** "''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' for the eye, a review of Wayne G. Hammond and Christina Scull’s ''[[The Art of The Lord of the Rings]]''
The issue contains also a hobbit genealogical crossword puzzle by Karolina Stopa-Olszanska 'Melinir' and Tolkien news from Poland and abroad.
